channel.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][b][u]Introduction[/u][/b]: 2006redone is a runescape remake based in 2006. The creator of the server is Mr Extremez. The server is not up yet, but will be up for pre alpha very soon.
[b][u]When is pre alpha coming out?[/u][/b] August 10th. This friday.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lK1VF.png[/img]
[url=http://www.2006redone.co.cc/title.ws]Visit the Website Here[/url]
[u][b]Progress[/b][/u]:
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[u][b]Client Features[/b][/u]:
- Fast client - Autocache downloader - 377 Maps - 377 Items - 377 Anims/Gfx - 377 Gameframe - 377 Npcs - No customs
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate -Zombie
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]: - Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Canoes - Spirit Tree
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Rock Golem - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [u][b]Fishing[/b][/u]:
- All fishing spots - All fishes fishable - Correct equipment - Correct animations - Moving locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [b][u]Slayer[/u][/b]:
- All Slayer Masters - All Slayer Monsters - Basic Slayer Gem - Slayer Points - Slayer Shop
[u][b]To do[/b][/u]:
-Farming
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
-Project Insanity Combat with many fixes and Add-Ons. -Perfect Range Formula -Melee Max hit Formula Tweaked
[u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]:
-Agrith Na-Na -Agrith Naar -Big Wolf -Bouncer -Chaos Elemental -Chronozon -Count Draynor -Culinaromancer -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Damis -Delrith -Dessous -Dessourt -Elvarg -Fareed -Flambeed -General Khazard -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -Kamil -King Black Dragon -Koschei The Deathless -Nezikchened -Salarin the Twisted -Sea Troll Queen -Slash Bash -Shaikahan -Tanglefoot -Tolna -Treus Dayth -TzTok-Jad
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Genie -Sandwhich Lady -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken -Freaky Forester
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]:
-Cook's Assistant -Romeo and Juliet -Witches Potion -Imp Catcher -Dorics Quest -Vampyre Slayer -Restless Ghost -Gertrude's Cat -Sheep Shearer -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)
[b][u]Membership[/u][/b]:
- Member objects - One time fee $ 7.50 dollars. - Members only teleports - Members items - Pre alpha/Beta will be free - Members/Non Members Skills
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]:
-97 % of runescape spawns includes (fish spots, all shops, all main cities, and more) -100 % of runescape shops (106 shops loaded) -99.9 % of dupes fixed (If there are any left they will be fixed asap) -90 % + all skills to be done -99 % of runescape foods added -97 % of all doors around the world (Will be adding the rest when found) -99 % potions (All should be added may be missing one or two) -95 % runescape drops (Will find bugs in beta testing phase) -All guilds openable with requirements -Wilderness warning sign -Normal and Ancient Magics (No lunars because it wasn't in 2006) -Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more...) -Old Runescape Starter -Runescape price rip -Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape -Report Abuse -Runescape like Sailing with all locations -Full Gnome Glider Transportation -Bank Pins -Christmas Crackers -Fully Functional Teletabs -Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc...) -Full Weapon Poisioning -Many, May, Bugs fixed -Add or Drop Item Function (If you don't have enough room it goes on the ground) -Chat Filtering System -Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides -Hostname Blacklist Implemented -Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass -Running with Energy (Will have weight soon) -Runescape Combat Exp Rates -Magic Carpet -Ladder System -Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life) -Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet) -Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded) -Hide Tanning -Canoes -Music Player -Teletabs -Looping animations added (Don't stop half way through) -Random Events -Crystal Chest -Flax Stringing -Aubury -Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking) -Clipped Following -Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) - Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) - Perfect Magic Enchanting added - Al Kharid Desert Added - Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items - Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped - Pets System - Global Drops - Added md5 password encryption now all passwords will be secure

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:67, topic:450997”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=553875.msg4073280#msg4073280 date=1344560433]
Is this regular aggresiveness? or have you done it where when a person in a zamorak (or is it sara ? ) item they get attacked and any other time they don’t
[/quote]Regular aggressiveness, I’ll add the bandit aggressiveness when I get a chance and it’s both I think…[/quote]you sir are correct!

Bandits are attackable criminals that can be found at the Kharidian Desert Bandit Camp. They will attack anyone wearing any Saradomin or Zamorak clothing or accessories, as they are supporters of Zaros. Because of this, many people use this to their advantage while training and therefore earn a high amount of experience with little effort. They can also be pickpocketed at level 53 Thieving, which is slightly higher for their Pollnivnian counterparts.

I didn’t know that

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Loveandpower:

is your clipping server or client sided and how does it work? is this the regular clipping that was released a long time ago or what? does it still have that following bug in it where it won’t clip always ? does it clip through spawned objects

Server side clipping, with Killamess’ implementation of Tile, projectile, and dumb path finding. there are still a few bugs with clipped attacking, not sure why.

Spawned object clipping is unnecessary due to it being a remake.

Read full topic
